title: Installation issue: clingo-bootstrap-spack
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
1. Switch to clingo concretizer
2. spack concretize -f
(...)
==> Installing ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab
==> No binary for ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://mirror.spack.io/_source-cache/archive/30/30306e0c76e0f9f1f0de987cf1c82a5c21e1ce6568b9227f7da5b71cbea86c9d.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> No patches needed for ncurses
==> ncurses: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> ncurses: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> ncurses: Executing phase: 'build'
==> ncurses: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'install'

7 errors found in build log:
     3829    mkdir -p /afs/cern.ch/user/r/razumov/.spack/bootstrap/store/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab/lib
     3830    linking /afs/cern.ch/user/r/razumov/.spack/bootstrap/store/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab/lib/libtinfo.so.6.2
     3831    /build/razumov/cms-spack-repo/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc  -O2 --param max-inline-insns-single=1200 -shared -Wl,--version-script,resulting.map -Wl,-soname,`basename /afs/cern.ch/user/r/razumov/.spack/bootstrap/store/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab/lib/libtinf
             o.so.6.2 .6.2`.6,-stats,-lc -o /afs/cern.ch/user/r/razumov/.spack/bootstrap/store/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab/lib/libtinfo.so.6.2 ../obj_s/access.o ../obj_s/add_tries.o ../obj_s/alloc_ttype.o ../obj_s/codes.o ../obj_s/comp_captab.o ../obj_s/comp_error.o .
             ./obj_s/comp_hash.o ../obj_s/comp_userdefs.o ../obj_s/db_iterator.o ../obj_s/doalloc.o ../obj_s/entries.o ../obj_s/fallback.o ../obj_s/free_ttype.o ../obj_s/getenv_num.o ../obj_s/home_terminfo.o ../obj_s/init_keytry.o ../obj_s/lib_acs.o ../obj_s/lib_baudrate.o ../obj_s/lib_cur_term.o ../obj_s/lib_data.
             o ../obj_s/lib_has_cap.o ../obj_s/lib_kernel.o ../obj_s/lib_keyname.o ../obj_s/lib_longname.o ../obj_s/lib_napms.o ../obj_s/lib_options.o ../obj_s/lib_raw.o ../obj_s/lib_setup.o ../obj_s/lib_termcap.o ../obj_s/lib_termname.o ../obj_s/lib_tgoto.o ../obj_s/lib_ti.o ../obj_s/lib_tparm.o ../obj_s/lib_tputs
             .o ../obj_s/lib_trace.o ../obj_s/lib_ttyflags.o ../obj_s/lib_twait.o ../obj_s/name_match.o ../obj_s/names.o ../obj_s/obsolete.o ../obj_s/read_entry.o ../obj_s/read_termcap.o ../obj_s/strings.o ../obj_s/tries.o ../obj_s/trim_sgr0.o ../obj_s/unctrl.o ../obj_s/visbuf.o ../obj_s/alloc_entry.o ../obj_s/capt
             oinfo.o ../obj_s/comp_expand.o ../obj_s/comp_parse.o ../obj_s/comp_scan.o ../obj_s/parse_entry.o ../obj_s/write_entry.o ../obj_s/define_key.o ../obj_s/hashed_db.o ../obj_s/key_defined.o ../obj_s/keybound.o ../obj_s/keyok.o ../obj_s/version.o -L../lib
     3832    /cvmfs/cms.cern.ch/slc7_amd64_gcc900/external/gcc/9.3.0/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/9.3.0/../../../../x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/ld: total time in link: 0.063861
     3833    cd /afs/cern.ch/user/r/razumov/.spack/bootstrap/store/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-t36ypwzymsu6iyb4hj4fxho4f6ehxtab/lib && (ln -s -f libtinfo.so.6.2 libtinfo.so.6; ln -s -f libtinfo.so.6 libtinfo.so; )
     3834    test -z "" && /usr/sbin/ldconfig
  >> 3835    /usr/sbin/ldconfig: Can't create temporary cache file /etc/ld.so.cache~: Permission denied
 (... a few more errors from ldconfig trying to create temporary cache ...)
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3052-729d66a
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

compiler config: https://gist.github.com/iarspider/1d786ccee028ca9eec4630e7e68c1130

### Additional information

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

The `clingo-bootstrap-spack` doesn't seem to be a real package, so no idea whom to ping.

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
